title: Order
description: The order placed for a product list.

xdm:purchaseID.title: Purchase ID
xdm:purchaseID.description: Unique identifier assigned by the seller for this purchase or contract. There is no guarantee that the ID is unique.

xdm:purchaseOrderNumber.title: Purchase Order Number
xdm:purchaseOrderNumber.description: Unique identifier assigned by the purchaser for this purchase or contract.

xdm:payments.title: Payment List
xdm:payments.description: The list of payments for this order.

xdm:refunds.title: Refunds List
xdm:refunds.description: The list of refunds for this order.

xdm:currencyCode.title: Currency
xdm:currencyCode.description: The ISO 4217 currency code used for the order totals.

xdm:taxAmount.title: Tax Amount
xdm:taxAmount.description: The tax amount paid by the buyer as part of the final payment.

xdm:discountAmount.title: Discount Amount
xdm:discountAmount.description: The difference between the regular price and the special price - applied to the entire order, rather than to individual products.

xdm:priceTotal.title: Price Total
xdm:priceTotal.description: The total price of this order after all discounts and taxes have been applied.

xdm:orderType.title: Order Type
xdm:orderType.description: The type order that has been placed.

xdm:lastUpdatedDate.title: Last Updated Date
xdm:lastUpdatedDate.description: The time when a particular order record is last updated in the commerce system.

xdm:createdDate.title: Created Date
xdm:createdDate.description: The time/date when a new order is created in the commerce system.

xdm:cancelDate.title: Cancel Date
xdm:cancelDate.description: The date/time when an order cancellation is initiated by the shopper.
